column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Attracted by the ridiculously cheap prices displayed on the menu outside
column2: my friend and I wandered in thinking this was a nice up-scale cafe in which we could both order a plate and be satisfied. Unfortunately we failed to realize how tiny the portions were because the main focus were the tapas. There's nothing wrong with that
column3: and the small dishes we ordered (spicy potatoes and brussels sprouts salad? or something of that nature) were absolutely delicious. The tapas themselves take a long time to bake and prepare because they make them fresh
column4: but overall really great atmosphere and lovely service.
